original: don ci zhig zhus she na /
analyzed: don ci zhig zhus she na /
translated: What is the meaning of the question?

original: ci slad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ci slad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfor what reason‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention is this:

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i @34a * //üîΩlus 'di ci'i slad du zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba'i rgyu las 'dra bar gyur pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pas 'od gsal ba las bzhengs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi sku bzhin du lus can
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i @34a * // lus 'di ci'i slad du zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ba'i rgyu las 'dra bar gyur pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pas 'od gsal ba las bzhengs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi sku bzhin du lus can
translated: This body, which is pure by nature as the essence of coemergence,üîΩfor what reason is it the case that the effect arises in similarity to the cause, which is the nature of the five contaminated elements?

original: thams cad kyang 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'gyur te /
translated: By this reasoning, all embodied beings would be like the body of Vajradhara, who arises from clear light.

original: lhan cig skyes pas bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pas bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is generated by coemergence.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: zhes bya ba la 'jig rten pa'i 'di ni bde ba tsam yin na ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'jig rten pa'i 'di ni bde ba tsam yin na ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the world, this is mere pleasure. How should it be called coemergence?

original: 'dra ba dang rgyu'i ngo bo yang yod pa de'i phyir rdo rje'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te reg par gyur pa na sra ba nyid ni chos so //
analyzed: 'dra ba dang rgyu'i ngo bo yang yod pa de'i phyir rdo rje'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te reg par gyur pa na sra ba nyid ni chos so //
translated: Since the nature of the cause also exists, he says, ‚Äúthe vajra and lotus,‚Äù and so on. When there is contact, the nature of solidity is the earth element.

original: chos ni sa'o //
analyzed: chos ni sa'o //
translated: Earth is the element.

original: byang chub sems ni khu ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems ni khu ba ste /
translated: The bodhicitta is the semen,

original: rlan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rlan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of moisture.

original: bskyod pa las ni me'o //
analyzed: bskyod pa las ni me'o //
translated: From the shaking, there is fire.

original: khu ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: khu ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni rlung ngo //
translated: The movement of the semen is wind.

original: de'i bde ba ni nam mkha'i khams te ;
analyzed: de'i bde ba ni nam mkha'i khams te ;
translated: Its bliss is the space element,

original: snang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of nonappearance.

original: gal te phung po lnga'i bdag nyid ni yin du zad na bde ba chen pos bskyed pa nyid yin pas zag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phung po lnga'i bdag nyid ni yin du zad na bde ba chen pos bskyed pa nyid yin pas zag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the five aggregates are the nature of the five elements, why is it that they are not the nature of the uncontaminated?

original: de'i phyir bde ba de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚ÄúThat bliss is the nature of the five elements,‚Äù and so on.

original: kun rdzob tu rdo rje dang padmas bskyed pa de ni de kho na nyid ces bya ba yang ma yin la don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu rdo rje dang padmas bskyed pa de ni de kho na nyid ces bya ba yang ma yin la don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa yang ma yin no //
translated: That which is generated by the vajra and lotus on the conventional level is not called reality, nor is it the ultimate co-emergence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
analyzed: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
translated: Because it is generated from the great elements.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: 'byung ba chen po bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is generated from the great elements.

original: gal te 'byung ba chen po skyed par byed pa yin pas 'byung ba chen po zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'byung ba chen po skyed par byed pa yin pas 'byung ba chen po zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: If it is called a great element because it generates the great elements,

original: de ltar na sngar ci'i phyir bsngags par byed ce na /
analyzed: de ltar na sngar ci'i phyir bsngags par byed ce na /
translated: then why was it praised earlier?

original: lhan cig skyes par gang skyes pa //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes par gang skyes pa //
translated: That which is born together with

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab dag las gang byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni don dam par lhan cig skyes par zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab dag las gang byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni don dam par lhan cig skyes par zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: That which arises from the method and insight that are of an inner nature, and which is the co-emergence that has the characteristic of being uncontaminated, that is the ultimate co-emergence, which is to be expressed by the word co-emergence.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to clearly teach just this, he says, ‚Äúnature,‚Äù and so on.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni rnam grangs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni rnam grangs so //
translated: The nature of all phenomena, suchness, the perfect limit, and essence are synonyms.

original: @34b de nyid lhan cig skyes pa nyid //
analyzed: @34b de nyid lhan cig skyes pa nyid //
translated: That itself is connate.

original: ces bya ba'i sgras sngar brjod pa yin gyi bde ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i sgras sngar brjod pa yin gyi bde ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù refers to what was mentioned earlier, not just bliss.

original: de khyad par ci lta bu can zhig ce na /
analyzed: de khyad par ci lta bu can zhig ce na /
translated: What is its special quality?

original: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúall aspects,‚Äù and so on.

original: rnam pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do //
translated: All aspects are all the qualities of a buddha.

original: de dag mdor bsdus pa ni sdom pa ste /
analyzed: de dag mdor bsdus pa ni sdom pa ste /
translated: Their summary is the essence.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all the qualities of a buddha are based on that.

original: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i lhan cig bskyed pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid can gyi thabs dang shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i lhan cig bskyed pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus he describes the connate joy that arises from the samƒÅdhi of method and wisdom that has an inner nature.

original: de ni dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: he states:

original: rnal 'byor snying rje thabs su 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor snying rje thabs su 'gyur // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Compassion is the method for the yogi.

original: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems ni snying rje'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems ni snying rje'o //
translated: Compassion is the mind of sameness toward all sentient beings.

original: de nyid ni thabs kyi mchog yin te de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gtso bo'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni thabs kyi mchog yin te de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gtso bo'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the supreme method, because it is the nature of the principal means for accomplishing perfect complete enlightenment.

original: de nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the principal thing for the yogis.

original: phyag rgya ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni shes rab bo //
translated: The seal is wisdom.

original: de gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: de gang zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: stong pa nyid de chos thams cad kyis ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid de chos thams cad kyis ma skyes pa'o //
translated: It is emptiness, the non-arising of all phenomena.

original: ma skyes pa nyid ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: ma skyes pa nyid ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is it non-arising?

original: rgyu dang bral ba las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyu dang bral ba las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He states: from the absence of a cause.

original: bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis las chos thams cad ma skyes pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis las chos thams cad ma skyes pa nyid do //
translated: All phenomena do not arise from self, other, or both.

original: ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can ni stong pa nyid de mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can ni stong pa nyid de mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: The characteristic of the unborn is emptiness, which is the highest wisdom.

original: de dag dbyer med pa 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba de byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i sgras bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag dbyer med pa 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can don dam pa'i lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba de byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i sgras bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: The inseparability of those two has the characteristic of clear light, which is called the ultimate co-emergence. That is indicated by the word ‚Äúawakened mind.‚Äù

original: yang phyi rol gyi phyag rgya las nyams su myong ba'i bde ba tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: yang phyi rol gyi phyag rgya las nyams su myong ba'i bde ba tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is not merely the bliss experienced from an external consort.

original: gal te 'di dag rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgom par byed pas na gsang sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa bya'am 'on te mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di dag rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgom par byed pas na gsang sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa bya'am 'on te mi bya zhe na /
translated: If one cultivates these as a yogin of the completion stage, should one perform mantra recitation and so forth, or not?

original: sngags kyi bzlas med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúWithout mantra recitation,‚Äù and so forth.

original: sngags ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Mantra‚Äù refers to the syllables om and so forth.

original: me la mar la sogs pa blugs pa ni sbyin sreg go //
analyzed: me la mar la sogs pa blugs pa ni sbyin sreg go //
translated: ‚Äú Fire offering‚Äù refers to pouring clarified butter and so forth into the fire.

original: dkyil 'khor ba'i dbus su gnas pa ni dkyil 'khor can no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ba'i dbus su gnas pa ni dkyil 'khor can no //
translated: ‚Äú Mandala‚Äù refers to the one who abides in the center of the mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The mandala is the celestial mansion.

original: gal te de lta na bsngags bzlas pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnal 'byor ba de la yod par mi @35a * //üîΩ'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na bsngags bzlas pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnal 'byor ba de la yod par mi @35a * // 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the result of the recitation of the mantra, etc. would not exist for that yogin.

original: de'i phyir de ni sngags bzlas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni sngags bzlas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúThat is the reality of the mantra recitation, etc.‚Äù

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid bsngags pa'i de kho na nyid yin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid bsngags pa'i de kho na nyid yin no //
translated: That very samƒÅdhi of the meditation on the innate of the perfection stage is the reality of the mantra recitation.

original: sems ni ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: sems ni ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The mind is the bodhicitta as previously explained.

original: de nyid ni bsdus pa ste chos thams cad ro gcig par bsdus pas rnal 'byor pa de'i gzugs can du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni bsdus pa ste chos thams cad ro gcig par bsdus pas rnal 'byor pa de'i gzugs can du gyur pa'o //
translated: That very [mind] is the collection, since all phenomena are collected as one taste. The yogin becomes endowed with that.

original: de lta bu ni 'dir bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bu ni 'dir bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That is what is called ‚Äúthe fourth consecration‚Äù here.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad 'dis mngon sum du dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad 'dis mngon sum du dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since all conceptual stains are purified by this, it is direct.

original: dbang bskur ba gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The chapter that clarifies the consecration is also called that.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las le'u bcu pa'i 'grel ba'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las le'u bcu pa'i 'grel ba'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the tenth chapter of the Vajra of Delight Tantra, in the commentary called ‚ÄúThe Jewel Rosary.‚Äù

original: // / gsang sngags kyi gzhung lugs la sems can rnams gzhug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / gsang sngags kyi gzhung lugs la sems can rnams gzhug pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to introduce sentient beings to the scriptural tradition of mantra,

original: lta stangs bzhi po ltung bar byed pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang rengs par bya ba rnams mnyam par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lta stangs bzhi po ltung bar byed pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang rengs par bya ba rnams mnyam par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the four gazes‚Äîthe gaze that causes to fall, the gaze that brings under control, the gaze that summons, and the gaze that paralyzes‚Äîare taught in ‚Äúequal,‚Äù etc.

original: mnyam pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEqual‚Äù means unmoving.

original: ma rungs pa ni khor ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ma rungs pa ni khor ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWicked‚Äù means wrathful.

original: dpral ba can ni mig 'bras gnyis dpral ba la brten pa ste /
analyzed: dpral ba can ni mig 'bras gnyis dpral ba la brten pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúForehead‚Äù means the two eyeballs are placed on the forehead.

original: des ni ltung bar byed do //üîΩgang g-yon phyogs su brten pa ni g-yon na gnas pa ste des dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: des ni ltung bar byed do // gang g-yon phyogs su brten pa ni g-yon na gnas pa ste des dbang du bya'o //
translated: By that, one causes to fall.üîΩThat which is placed on the left side is ‚Äúon the left,‚Äù and by that, one brings under control.

original: gang steng du brten pa dag gis g-yas logs su blta ba des ni dgug par bya bas so //
analyzed: gang steng du brten pa dag gis g-yas logs su blta ba des ni dgug par bya bas so //
translated: That which is placed above, looking to the right, by that, one summons.

original: sna gong du drang por blta ba gang yin pa des ni rengs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sna gong du drang por blta ba gang yin pa des ni rengs par bya ba'o //
translated: The one who looks straight at the tip of the nose should do the stiffening.

original: sna'i rtse mo nas 'byung ba nyid kyi rlung ni 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mo nas 'byung ba nyid kyi rlung ni 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: The wind that arises from the tip of the nose is the arising.

original: 'jug pa ni 'gengs byed do //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni 'gengs byed do //
translated: The entering is the filling.

original: nang gang bar 'gyur ba ni bum pa'o //
analyzed: nang gang bar 'gyur ba ni bum pa'o //
translated: The one who becomes filled within is the vase.

original: zhugs nas mi g-yo bar gyur pa ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: zhugs nas mi g-yo bar gyur pa ni zhi ba'o //
translated: Having entered, the one who becomes unmoving is the pacification.

original: 'di dag goms par bya ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir rlon pa'i shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di dag goms par bya ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir rlon pa'i shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the place of practice of these, he says, ‚Äúon a fresh tree,‚Äù etc.

original: khu ba dang bcas pa'i shing dang / me tog dmar po dang / rdo rje shing dang / g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rtsva rnams la'o //
analyzed: khu ba dang bcas pa'i shing dang / me tog dmar po dang / rdo rje shing dang / g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i rtsva rnams la'o //
translated: On trees with sap, red flowers, diamond trees, and moving grasses.

original: 'khrul pa ni the tshom dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa ni the tshom dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The error is with doubt.

original: gsang ba'i lta stangs ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na /
analyzed: gsang ba'i lta stangs ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na /
translated: Why is the secret gaze not taught?

original: 'dir dgongs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dgongs pa ma yin te /
translated: Here it is not intended.

original: lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni //
analyzed: lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni //
translated: Having accomplished the four gazes,

original: mkhas pas sems can gzhug @35b par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas sems can gzhug @35b par bya //
translated: the wise one should engage the sentient beings.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: skye ba bdun pa ni len bdun skyes pa'o //üîΩdga' bral dga' ba smod pa la //
analyzed: skye ba bdun pa ni len bdun skyes pa'o // dga' bral dga' ba smod pa la //
translated: One who has taken seven births is one who has been born seven times.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub bo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dngos grub bo //
translated: The joy of the separation from joy is the praise of the innate nature.

original: dbang gi las la ni ku ru kulle khyad par du bsngags te /
analyzed: dbang gi las la ni ku ru kulle khyad par du bsngags te /
translated: The rite of subjugation is praised as being special for Kurukulla.

original: de'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: Her sadhana is summarized here.

original: gang sngon du bstan pa der ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: gang sngon du bstan pa der ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
translated: What was taught before is the extensive explanation.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud brtag pa bcu gnyis par ro //üîΩmda' ni mda'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud brtag pa bcu gnyis par ro // mda' ni mda'o //
translated: It is in the twelve chapters of the tantra of Hevajra.üîΩAn arrow is an arrow.

original: gzhu ni gzhu'o //üîΩautpala ni autpalo //
analyzed: gzhu ni gzhu'o // autpala ni autpalo //
translated: A bow is a bow.üîΩA blue lotus is a blue lotus.

original: lcags kyu ni lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu ni lcags kyu'o //
translated: A hook is a hook.

original: thams cad kyang dmar po'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyang dmar po'o //
translated: All are red.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: A vajra is Vajradhara.

original: de'i snying po ni thugs te dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i snying po ni thugs te dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: His essence is his mind, which is Hevajra.

original: de'i mngon par zhes bya ba ma lus par rtogs pa gang yang yod pa de ni rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mngon par zhes bya ba ma lus par rtogs pa gang yang yod pa de ni rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: The complete realization of his manifest enlightenment is the manifest enlightenment of the essence of the vajra.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i rtog pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i rtog pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The thought that illuminates that is also called that.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las brtag pa dang po'i 'grel ba'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las brtag pa dang po'i 'grel ba'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the first chapter of the Yoga-Ratnamala, the commentary on the Hevajra tantra called the Vajra-Siddhi.

original: // / ras ris la sogs pa lha rnams nges par gnas pa ni rab gnas so //
analyzed: // / ras ris la sogs pa lha rnams nges par gnas pa ni rab gnas so //
translated: The consecration of the deities such as the painting is the consecration.

original: 'dir ni de'i cho ga la rab gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni de'i cho ga la rab gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: Here, the rite of that is called the consecration.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: Its definition is its own nature.

original: rdo rje ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni phyag na rdo rje ste /
translated: Vajra means Vajrapani.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: It is the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid ni snying po ste de'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni snying po ste de'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That itself is the essence, and he who has that nature is so called.

original: sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni bgegs gzhig par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni bgegs gzhig par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Homa means for the purpose of destroying obstacles.

original: srod la zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo rtsom pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: srod la zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo rtsom pa'i dus su'o //
translated: In the evening means at the time of beginning the night.

original: sta gon la sogs byas nas ni //
analyzed: sta gon la sogs byas nas ni //
translated: Having performed the preliminary and so forth,

original: zhes bya ba ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means having performed the consecration in accordance with the rite.

original: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas par bya ba'o //
translated: All buddhas means the consecration.

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa'i sngags bstan pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa'i sngags bstan pa'o //
translated: The mantra O·πÉ... and so forth teaches the offering mantra.

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The various means the various forms.

original: gong ma'i rgyud kyi lugs rim pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud rgyas pa'i cho ga'i rim pas so //
analyzed: gong ma'i rgyud kyi lugs rim pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud rgyas pa'i cho ga'i rim pas so //
translated: The sequence of the former tantra is the sequence of the extensive rite of the Hevajra Tantra.

original: skabs la bab pa'i sbyin sreg thams cad bstan pa'i phyir zhi ba'i thab khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: skabs la bab pa'i sbyin sreg thams cad bstan pa'i phyir zhi ba'i thab khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach all the fire sacrifices that are appropriate, he says the fire pit for pacification, and so forth.

original: de nyid la ni zhes bya ba ni gsum po 'di nyid la ci ltar rigs par til la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya ba'o //üîΩlha mo khyed ni zhes @36a * //
analyzed: de nyid la ni zhes bya ba ni gsum po 'di nyid la ci ltar rigs par til la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya ba'o // lha mo khyed ni zhes @36a * //
translated: In that very place means in these three, one should perform the fire sacrifice with sesame seeds, and so forth, as is appropriate.

original: bya ba la sogs pa ni sa gzung ba'i skabs su ste /
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa ni sa gzung ba'i skabs su ste /
translated: The goddess and so forth is in the context of taking possession of the ground.

original: 'di ni sngags brjod pa'i skabs yin par bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni sngags brjod pa'i skabs yin par bstan to //
translated: This teaches the context of reciting the mantra.

original: mthar ni aargha la sogs pa'i sngags te me la dbul ba'o //
analyzed: mthar ni aargha la sogs pa'i sngags te me la dbul ba'o //
translated: Finally, the mantra of the argha and so on, which is offered to the fire.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las dang po rab gnas kyi le'u'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las dang po rab gnas kyi le'u'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the commentary on the first chapter of the Yoga-Ratnamala, the commentary on the Hevajra Tantra.

original: // / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'o //
analyzed: // / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'o //
translated: Vajragarbha said means asked.

original: nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams kyi dge ba ma yin pa'i chos thog ma med pa'i dus nas brtsams pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams kyi dge ba ma yin pa'i chos thog ma med pa'i dus nas brtsams pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: As for like space, and so on, the non-virtuous dharmas of sentient beings, beginning from time without beginning, are like space.

original: de dag gi gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa ni rang 'dod pa'i lha bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa ni rang 'dod pa'i lha bsgom pa'o //
translated: The antidote to those is the meditation on one's desired deity.

original: de lta bas na mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phung po ni rgya mtsho lta bu yin la /
analyzed: de lta bas na mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phung po ni rgya mtsho lta bu yin la /
translated: Therefore, the mass of adverse factors is like an ocean,

original: gnyen po'i phyogs ni ku ba lta bur gnas pas /
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs ni ku ba lta bur gnas pas /
translated: and the side of the antidote remains like a gourd.

original: mi dge ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar nus pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar nus pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is thought that one is not able to cross the ocean of non-virtue.

original: de ltar na sems can rnams de bsgoms pas grol bar ci ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar na sems can rnams de bsgoms pas grol bar ci ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'i don to //
translated: Thus, how will sentient beings be liberated by cultivating that? is the meaning of the question.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: bdag med rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag med rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The yoga of selflessness, etc.

original: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te de dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid dam //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te de dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid dam //
translated: Yoga is meditative concentration, and one who possesses that is the self.

original: yang na dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni rnal 'byor gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phung po ma lus par spongs nas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni rnal 'byor gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phung po ma lus par spongs nas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, one who possesses the yoga of glorious Heruka, having abandoned all the aggregates that are adverse to yoga without remainder, will certainly be liberated.

original: gal te rgya mtsho lta bu'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phung po las lha'i rnal 'byor tsam gyis ji ltar rgal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgya mtsho lta bu'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phung po las lha'i rnal 'byor tsam gyis ji ltar rgal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the aggregates that are adverse to the ocean-like [aggregates] are crossed over merely by the yoga of the deity, how will one be liberated?

original: rgal bar 'gyur ba nyid yin te ji ltar ri'i phug gi nang gi mun pa'i phung po yun ring por bsags pa ni 'bar ma thag pa'i me sgron gyis skad cig gis mi snang bar byed do //
analyzed: rgal bar 'gyur ba nyid yin te ji ltar ri'i phug gi nang gi mun pa'i phung po yun ring por bsags pa ni 'bar ma thag pa'i me sgron gyis skad cig gis mi snang bar byed do //
translated: It is just as a mass of darkness in a mountain cave, accumulated for a long time, is instantly destroyed by the light of a lamp.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang bdag med ma dang dgyes pa'i rdo rje bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang bdag med ma dang dgyes pa'i rdo rje bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: So too here, by the special meditation on NairƒÅtmya and Hevajra, it is thought that it will be destroyed.

original: gal te de ltar na yang gnyen po'i phyogs skad cig tsam bsgoms pas mi mthun pa nyams par 'gyur ba zhig yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na yang gnyen po'i phyogs skad cig tsam bsgoms pas mi mthun pa nyams par 'gyur ba zhig yin na /
translated: But even if that is so, if the adverse is destroyed by the mere momentary meditation on the side of the antidote,

original: de lta na ni ci'i phyir dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni ci'i phyir dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: why then is there no accomplishment of power?

original: de ni bden ni de lta na mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyams pa tsam gyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob pa ni ma @36b yin no //
analyzed: de ni bden ni de lta na mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyams pa tsam gyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob pa ni ma @36b yin no //
translated: That is true, but the power of the Great Seal is not attained merely by the destruction of the adverse side.

original: 'on kyang tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa des ni 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa des ni 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is attained by the completion of the two collections.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: with the mind of another.

original: gzhan pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid can gyi bsgom pa'i khyad par las so //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid can gyi bsgom pa'i khyad par las so //
translated: The mind of another refers to the special meditation that has the characteristic of serenity.

original: de yang rim gyis goms pas 'thob par bya ba yin pas na /üîΩde'i phyir / dang por goms par byed dus kyis //
analyzed: de yang rim gyis goms pas 'thob par bya ba yin pas na / de'i phyir / dang por goms par byed dus kyis //
translated: And that is to be attained by gradual practice.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te /
translated: First, in the time of practice,

original: mtshan dus su zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo nyid kyi dus su ste /
analyzed: mtshan dus su zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo nyid kyi dus su ste /
translated: At night, the time of the stars,

original: dus gzhan na mi mthun pa'i sa phyogs 'byung bar 'gyur bas so //üîΩbdag nyid 'grub pa'i zhes pa ni mos pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: dus gzhan na mi mthun pa'i sa phyogs 'byung bar 'gyur bas so // bdag nyid 'grub pa'i zhes pa ni mos pa'i khyad par te /
translated: In a place that is not disagreeable at other times,

original: mtshan mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa'o //
translated: One should practice yoga in equipoise.

original: de las gzhan pa'i dus su rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i dus su rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to practice without interruption at other times,üîΩhe says:

original: rkang pa 'khrud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rkang pa 'khrud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Washing the feet, etc.

original: bsten pa dang zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsten pa dang zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase one should rely means one should approach.

original: gang la bsnyen par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang la bsnyen par bya zhe na /
translated: Approaching what?

original: rnal 'byor ma ste bdag med ma la'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ste bdag med ma la'o //
translated: The yoginƒ´, NairƒÅtmyƒÅ.

original: gzhan gyi gzugs kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi gzugs kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis so //
translated: The phrase in another's form means in a form that is not NairƒÅtmyƒÅ.

original: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: The phrase the essence of the vajra is a summary.

original: nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni skyon no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni skyon no //
translated: The phrase affliction means a fault.

original: brtan pa nyid bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa nyid bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to generate firmness.

original: brtse bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: brtse bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The phrase with love and so on.

original: zla phyed ces bya ba ni zla ba phyed do //
analyzed: zla phyed ces bya ba ni zla ba phyed do //
translated: The phrase half month means fifteen days.

original: nyi ma gcig tu zhes bya ba ni shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: nyi ma gcig tu zhes bya ba ni shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The phrase in one day means in a very concentrated manner.

original: lan cig ces bya ba ni rtag tu thun re goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lan cig ces bya ba ni rtag tu thun re goms par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase once means one should practice in every session.

original: 'jig zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yid ches pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'jig zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yid ches pa ston par byed do //
translated: The phrase destroy and so on shows confidence.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nges par shes nas zhes bya ba ni nges par spyod pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nges par shes nas zhes bya ba ni nges par spyod pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: Thus, etc. Having known for certain means having the nature of definite practice.

original: phan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi phan pa ste dge ba ma yin pa ni zad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: phan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi phan pa ste dge ba ma yin pa ni zad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The result of benefit will arise, and the non-beneficial, i.e., the unwholesome, will be exhausted.

original: du 'bod ces bya ba la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa ni dmyal ba'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: du 'bod ces bya ba la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa ni dmyal ba'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The worldly conduct is the cause of hell.

original: gal te de lta bur gnas par gyur kyang sdig pa can la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chan po'i dngos grub 'thob pa'i skabs ga la yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te de lta bur gnas par gyur kyang sdig pa can la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chan po'i dngos grub 'thob pa'i skabs ga la yod ce na /
translated: Even if one abides in that way, how can those who are sinful, etc. have the opportunity to attain the MahƒÅmudrƒÅ attainment?

original: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The five heinous acts, etc. are stated.

original: yan lag ma tshang  ba ni yan lag nyams pa'o //üîΩbsams @37a * //
analyzed: yan lag ma tshang  ba ni yan lag nyams pa'o // bsams @37a * //
translated: Incomplete means defective.

original: pas zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: pas zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma bsgoms pas so //
translated: Intentionally means not meditating on NairƒÅtmya.

original: gal te de ltar na chos dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni de 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na chos dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni de 'grub par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the righteous will not accomplish it.

original: dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: One who is always accustomed to the ten virtues, etc.

original: rtag tu goms pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos grub thob ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu goms pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos grub thob ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o //
translated: In one who is always accustomed to, etc., attains power means attains meditative concentration.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mnyam par gzhag pas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mnyam par gzhag pas zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it says by equipoise.

original: zla ba gcig tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zla ba gcig tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In for one month, etc.,

original: gsang la zhes bya ba ni sbas pa'i brtul zhugs las te phyag rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsang la zhes bya ba ni sbas pa'i brtul zhugs las te phyag rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: secretly means from the concealed observances, for the sake of attaining the Great Seal.

original: de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams gnang ba nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams gnang ba nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then the yoginƒ´s will show their consent.

original: byang chub sems kyis zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: By the thought of enlightenment means the going for refuge in the Three Jewels, etc.

original: lha'i gzugs kyis sems ni lha'i rnal 'byor nyid do //
analyzed: lha'i gzugs kyis sems ni lha'i rnal 'byor nyid do //
translated: The thought of the deity is the yoga of the deity.

original: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The observances are what are to be guarded, what are to be eaten, etc.

original: sems kyang gcig pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: sems kyang gcig pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The mind is also called ‚Äúone‚Äù because of the yoga of coemergence.

original: skal ldan par zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi skal ba dang ldan par ro //
analyzed: skal ldan par zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi skal ba dang ldan par ro //
translated: ‚Äú Fortunate‚Äù means endowed with the good fortune of spiritual powers.

original: rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Conception‚Äù means discursive thought.

original: bkug la zhes bya ba ni kun dgug pa'o //
analyzed: bkug la zhes bya ba ni kun dgug pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Summoned‚Äù means summoned all.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni mchog thob pa'am dgug pa de'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni mchog thob pa'am dgug pa de'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù means the attainment of the supreme or the summoning.

original: brtan pa bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brtan par rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brtan par rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú In order to teach stability‚Äù means in order to accomplish stability.

original: de nas longs spyod phyir ni spyad ma gsungs //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas longs spyod phyir ni spyad ma gsungs // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, for enjoyment, the conduct was not taught.

original: spyad par bshad ces bya ba sngar brtul zhugs kyi le'u'i nang du'o //
analyzed: spyad par bshad ces bya ba sngar brtul zhugs kyi le'u'i nang du'o //
translated: ‚Äú The conduct was explained‚Äù in the previous chapter on spiritual deportment.

original: 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni dka' ba dang bcas pas 'jug ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni dka' ba dang bcas pas 'jug ba nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú In a frightening way‚Äù means engaging in it with difficulty.

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol zhes bya ba la don ci zhig zhus she na /
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol zhes bya ba la don ci zhig zhus she na /
translated: ‚Äú Vajragarbha asked‚Äù ‚Äî what was the meaning of his question?

original: bdag med rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag med rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚Äú Selfless yoga‚Äù and so on.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The seal is the external seal.

original: ci'i phyir tshol bar byed ces bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir tshol bar byed ces bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Why is it sought?

original: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag gis //
analyzed: phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag gis //
translated: With two seals, with two seals,

original: zhes bya ba la gnyig phyag rgyar gyur pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gnyig phyag rgyar gyur pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub ces bya ba'o //
translated: the seals are both seals, and so it is called the attainment of the seals.

original: bud med gzugs zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'i gzugs so //
analyzed: bud med gzugs zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'i gzugs so //
translated: The form of a woman is the form of Nairatmya.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The Lord is Hevajra.

original: nu ma spangs pa zhes bya ba ni nu ma gnyis spangs par 'gyur bas rdo rjer 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: nu ma spangs pa zhes bya ba ni nu ma gnyis spangs par 'gyur bas rdo rjer 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The nipple is the two nipples, and so it is to be made into a vajra.

original: @37b 'gram gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: @37b 'gram gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The two cheeks and so forth.

original: 'gram gnyis po nyid dril bu zhes bya ba 'bras bur ro //
analyzed: 'gram gnyis po nyid dril bu zhes bya ba 'bras bur ro //
translated: The two cheeks are the bell.

original: ze'u 'bru zhes bya ba ni snang ste rdo rjer bya'o //
analyzed: ze'u 'bru zhes bya ba ni snang ste rdo rjer bya'o //
translated: The petal is the lotus, and so it is to be made into a vajra.

original: dga' chen zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dga' chen zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The great joy is the nature of great passion.

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúone will attain the spiritual powers of the consort‚Äù means that one will attain the spiritual powers of the great seal.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rim pa de gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rim pa de gnyis kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúFor that reason‚Äù means for the reasons of those two stages.

original: gsal dang mi gsal zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa dang ldan pa'i'o //üîΩgal te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pas lha'i gzugs gnyis thob par gyur pa de'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub de yang ji ltar gzhal yas khang na spyod pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lus 'chags pa dang 'jigs pa dag gis bskyed cing 'jigs par
analyzed: gsal dang mi gsal zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa dang ldan pa'i'o // gal te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pas lha'i gzugs gnyis thob par gyur pa de'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub de yang ji ltar gzhal yas khang na spyod pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lus 'chags pa dang 'jigs pa dag gis bskyed cing 'jigs par
translated: ‚ÄúClear and unclear‚Äù refers to those who are engaged in the meditation of the stage of generation.

original: 'gyur ba bzhin du yin nam zhe na /üîΩ'byung dang 'jigs pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: 'gyur ba bzhin du yin nam zhe na / 'byung dang 'jigs pa dag gis kyang //
translated: If one attains the spiritual powers of the great seal by attaining the two forms of the deity, then how is that spiritual power of the great seal generated and destroyed by the creation and destruction of the bodies of BrahmƒÅ and so on that dwell in the celestial mansion?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The verse states,

original: 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNor is it generated or destroyed by creation and destruction.‚ÄùüîΩIt is not harmed by creation and destruction.

original: ci'i phyir gnod par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gnod par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is it not harmed?

original: thabs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thabs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The method, etc.

original: 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba ni rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba ni rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The arising is the constant arising,

original: ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du rtag pas rtag par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du rtag pas rtag par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: since it is permanent as long as space endures. The meaning of ‚Äúpermanent‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúbecomes permanent.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid thabs te de'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba nyid ji ltar 'jig par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di nyid thabs te de'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba nyid ji ltar 'jig par 'gyur /
translated: This itself is the method. How could the result of that, the perfection of meditation, be destroyed?

original: 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Destruction‚Äù means the non-apprehension of all things.

original: de nyid ni shes rab ste 'di nyid kyis srid mthar byed ces bya ba lus la mngon par zhen pa mthar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni shes rab ste 'di nyid kyis srid mthar byed ces bya ba lus la mngon par zhen pa mthar byed pa'o //
translated: That itself is wisdom. By this alone, ‚Äúthe end of existence‚Äù is made, that is, the end of attachment to the body.

original: de dag ro gcig par 'gyur ba rmi lam dang mig 'phrul dang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu lta bu nam mkha' ji srid kyi bar du gnas pa'i sku gnyis ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: de dag ro gcig par 'gyur ba rmi lam dang mig 'phrul dang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu lta bu nam mkha' ji srid kyi bar du gnas pa'i sku gnyis ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
translated: The two bodies, which are of one taste, which remain as long as space endures, like a dream, an optical illusion, a magical creation, or a mirage, are the Great Seal, the supreme accomplishment.

original: gang gi phyir de lta bu'i rnam pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta bu'i rnam pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Because in this way, arising and destruction do not exist.

original: gzhan yang de kho na nyid du gang yang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: gzhan yang de kho na nyid du gang yang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin no ;
translated: Moreover, in reality, there is no destruction of anything.

original: / gal te la la dngos po'i ngo bo zhig tu gyur na ni skye zhing 'jig par yang 'gyur na /
analyzed: / gal te la la dngos po'i ngo bo zhig tu gyur na ni skye zhing 'jig par yang 'gyur na /
translated: If something were to become the nature of an entity, then it would arise and be destroyed.

original: ji srid mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid can yin pa de'i phyir gang zhig 'jig par 'gyur ba de med pas zad pa yang med do //üîΩde lta bas na de ltar phyag rgya @38a * //
analyzed: ji srid mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid can yin pa de'i phyir gang zhig 'jig par 'gyur ba de med pas zad pa yang med do // de lta bas na de ltar phyag rgya @38a * //
translated: But since the nature of non-abiding nirvana is unconditioned, therefore, since it does not exist, there is no exhaustion of it.üîΩThus, in this way, for one who has attained the Great Seal, there is no arising or destruction.

original: chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gnas pa yin no //
translated: This is the point.

original: de yang bsgoms pas thob par bya ba nyid yin pas ci lta bu zhig bsgoms par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de yang bsgoms pas thob par bya ba nyid yin pas ci lta bu zhig bsgoms par bya zhe na /
translated: Moreover, since it is to be attained by means of cultivation, what kind of cultivation should be done?

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The generation stage, etc.

original: spros pa zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can de rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can de rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: Elaboration is the various aspects of the nature of the support and the supported.

original: rmi lam ltar byas na zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rmi lam na sems nyid rnam pa sna tshogs par snang ba de ltar byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: rmi lam ltar byas na zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rmi lam na sems nyid rnam pa sna tshogs par snang ba de ltar byas pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúAs if in a dream‚Äù means just as in a dream the mind itself appears in various aspects.

original: spros ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dag gi rnam par rtog pas spros par mi byed cing rnam par rtog par mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: spros ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dag gi rnam par rtog pas spros par mi byed cing rnam par rtog par mi byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout conceptual elaboration‚Äù and so on means not elaborating and not conceptualizing with the conceptualization of the intellect.

original: rim pa 'di ltar goms par byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rim pa 'di ltar goms par byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens by becoming familiar with this process?

original: ji ltar sgyu ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúJust like an illusion,‚Äù and so on.

original: dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba na seng ge'i zla ba'i grong khyer ro //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba na seng ge'i zla ba'i grong khyer ro //
translated: The ‚Äúcity of gandharvas‚Äù is the city of Si·πÉhala.

original: de bzhin 'dod ces bya ba ni de lta bur gsal po nyid du gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dod ces bya ba ni de lta bur gsal po nyid du gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúJust like that‚Äù means just like that, clear.

original: da ni rim pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba chen po de nyid ngo bo nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bsgom par bya'o zhes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni rim pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba chen po de nyid ngo bo nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor bsgom par bya'o zhes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to establish that very great bliss, which is the nature of the stages, should be meditated on as the ma·πá·∏çala wheel of the nature, it is said, ‚Äúwith the great seal,‚Äù and so on.

original: phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba ste bzhi po de dag go //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba ste bzhi po de dag go //
translated: The consecration of the seal is the consecration of wisdom.

original: ci ltar shes pa'i zhes bya ba'i bla ma'i man ngag nyid las ji ltar rig pa'o //
analyzed: ci ltar shes pa'i zhes bya ba'i bla ma'i man ngag nyid las ji ltar rig pa'o //
translated: As for how it is known, it is known from the guru's instructions.

original: de ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed kyi mtshan nyid can te /
translated: Great bliss is the nature of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: de nyid las byung bar gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid las byung bar gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the nature of this mandala, which is the source of that.

original: byin rlabs zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byin rlabs zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Blessing is the nature of that.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the mandala of Hevajra and Nairatma.

original: gzhan las 'byung ba med ces bya ba ni gzhan las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan las 'byung ba med ces bya ba ni gzhan las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: It does not arise from another, meaning it does not arise from another.

original: gal te shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bde ba tsam nye bar dmigs pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bde ba tsam nye bar dmigs pa yin na /
translated: If the consecration of the wisdom initiation is the mere observation of bliss, which is characterized by the absence of conceptual elaborations,

original: des ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: des ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: How could the mandala endowed with the supreme of all aspects arise from that?

original: 'dra bar 'gyur ba las 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dra bar 'gyur ba las 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: It is said that what is similar arises from what is similar.

original: de ltar ni ma yin te //
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te //
translated: That is not so.

original: 'dra ba las 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyed tsam du yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba las 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyed tsam du yin te /
translated: What is similar arises from what is similar is merely a worldly convention.

original: @38b ji ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa smra ba rnams kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sa bon 'dzin pa yin no zhes smra ba ltar /
analyzed: @38b ji ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa smra ba rnams kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sa bon 'dzin pa yin no zhes smra ba ltar /
translated: Just as those who propound foundation consciousness say that foundation consciousness is the support of the seeds of sentient beings,

original: de bzhin du shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas rtogs par byas pa bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas rtogs par byas pa bde ba chen po'o //
translated: in the same way, the great bliss that is realized through the wisdom initiation is the support of the seeds of all phenomena.

original: mtshan nyid can chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba yang chos thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa nyid yin no zhes theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags las sngags par byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid can chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba yang chos thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa nyid yin no zhes theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags las sngags par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena that is characterized by that is the support of all phenomena. This is what is said in the secret mantra of the Great Vehicle.

original: de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to accomplish that,

original: bde ba gnag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bde ba gnag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares, ‚ÄúThe bliss, etc.‚Äù

original: gnyis sbyor zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis sbyor zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnion‚Äù is the meditative concentration of means and insight.

original: dngos ni sangs rgyas lda'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos ni sangs rgyas lda'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The ‚Äúentity‚Äù is the nature of the Buddhas.

original: dngos med ni de dag nyid kyis spros pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos med ni de dag nyid kyis spros pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The ‚Äúnon-entity‚Äù is the absence of conceptual elaboration by those [Buddhas].

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'di dkyil 'khor du ni ji ltar bde ba'i ngo bor 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'di dkyil 'khor du ni ji ltar bde ba'i ngo bor 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is this glorious Vajra of Delight, which is the nature of means and insight, in the mandala the nature of bliss?

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, ‚ÄúVajrasattva, etc.‚Äù

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag nyi ma dang zla ba yang dag par 'byor pa las 'byung ba'i sa bon las 'byung ba'i phyag mtshan gyi rdo rje dang / de'i dkyil na gnas pa'i sa bon ni sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag nyi ma dang zla ba yang dag par 'byor pa las 'byung ba'i sa bon las 'byung ba'i phyag mtshan gyi rdo rje dang / de'i dkyil na gnas pa'i sa bon ni sems dpa' ste /
translated: The nature of means and insight is the seed syllable that arises from the union of the sun and moon. The seed syllable in the middle of that is the ‚Äúbeing.‚Äù

original: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúbeing with a vajra‚Äù is Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid bde ba zhes bya bar brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid bde ba zhes bya bar brjod do //
translated: That is called ‚Äúbliss.‚Äù

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa zhes bya ba la don ci zhig gis gsol zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa zhes bya ba la don ci zhig gis gsol zhe na /
translated: The Vajra Essence-nature asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the meaning of the request?

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i ngo bo nyid du bsngags pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i ngo bo nyid du bsngags pa'i phyir /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn praises the reality of the creation stage as having the nature of bliss.

analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
