original: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni lha nyid bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni lha nyid bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation is the meditation on the deity.

original: med pa'i da skyed pa yis ni ci zhig dgos //
analyzed: med pa'i da skyed pa yis ni ci zhig dgos //
translated: What is the need for generating the non-existent?‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni dgos pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dgos pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no need.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention is this:

original: bde ba chen por mos pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i 'bad pa 'dos ci zhig dgos //
analyzed: bde ba chen por mos pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i 'bad pa 'dos ci zhig dgos //
translated: What is the need for the effort of meditating on the ma·πá·∏çala wheel with the imagination of great bliss?

original: bde ba chen po 'ba' zhig kho nas mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba chen po 'ba' zhig kho nas mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: The desired goal will be accomplished by great bliss alone.

original: gus pa bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩdad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams //
analyzed: gus pa bstan pa'i phyir / dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams //
translated: In order to demonstrate respect,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚ÄúI am weak with the force of faith.‚Äù

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gus pa dang ldan pa nyams pa zhes bya ba bskyed pa'i rim pa spong bar byed pa nyid do //üîΩlus kyi dngos med ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa de nyid @39a * //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gus pa dang ldan pa nyams pa zhes bya ba bskyed pa'i rim pa spong bar byed pa nyid do // lus kyi dngos med ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa de nyid @39a * //
translated: The one who is devoid of respect for the stage of generation is the one who abandons the stage of generation.

original: la stongs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: la stongs par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is devoid of the body is the one who is devoid of the stage of generation.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: gang las bde zhes bya ba de gzhan las bde ba nye bar bstan par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang las bde zhes bya ba de gzhan las bde ba nye bar bstan par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The one who is devoid of bliss is the one who is incapable of demonstrating bliss from another.

original: de lta bas na bde bas nye bar khyab pa de nyid 'gro ba zhes bya bar brjod do //üîΩkhyab par byed pa'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na bde bas nye bar khyab pa de nyid 'gro ba zhes bya bar brjod do // khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the pervasion by bliss is called the world.

original: khyab par bya ba'i ngo bos kyang yin no //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba'i ngo bos kyang yin no //
translated: It is not just by the nature of the pervader, but also by the nature of the pervaded.

original: gnyi ga yang khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te /üîΩji ltar bde ba med par yang lus la sogs pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te / ji ltar bde ba med par yang lus la sogs pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Both are the nature of the pervaded and the pervader.üîΩJust as the body, etc. do not exist without bliss,

original: lus de med par yang bde ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lus de med par yang bde ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and bliss does not exist without the body, etc. This is the meaning.

original: ji ltar me tog bya ba la sogs pas ni dpe gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar me tog bya ba la sogs pas ni dpe gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase just like a flower, etc., states the example.

original: gal te de ltar na dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa kho nas chog mod /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa kho nas chog mod /
translated: If it is so, then it is sufficient to meditate on the mandala circle alone.

original: bde ba chen po bsgom pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba chen po bsgom pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is the use of meditating on the great bliss?

original: dngos po dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: dngos po dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: To this he says, the entity, etc.,

original: dngos bdag ces bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gzugs nyid do //
analyzed: dngos bdag ces bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gzugs nyid do //
translated: The entity is the form of the mandala circle itself, which is the nature of the enjoyment body and emanation body.

original: dngos po bdag ma yin zhes bya ba las sogs pa ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid dang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: dngos po bdag ma yin zhes bya ba las sogs pa ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid dang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: The non-entity is the nature of the dharma body and the nature of the great bliss.

original: gal te khyod nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid zhig yin na ni da ltan dkyil 'khor ni gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te khyod nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid zhig yin na ni da ltan dkyil 'khor ni gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: If you are the nature of the mandala circle itself, then now, since the mandala is free from the nature of one and many,

original: khyod nyid 'khrul pa'i ngo bo yin pas de lta bas na sangs rgyas ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: khyod nyid 'khrul pa'i ngo bo yin pas de lta bas na sangs rgyas ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: You yourself are the essence of error, therefore you are not a Buddha.üîΩTherefore, it is said,

original: de lta bas na sangs rgyas bdag ces bya ba las sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bas na sangs rgyas bdag ces bya ba las sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Buddhahood is self, etc.

original: sangs rgyas bdag ces bya ba la dngos po ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bdag ces bya ba la dngos po ni chos thams cad do //
translated: Buddhahood is self means that all things are its substance.

original: de dag rtogs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rtogs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Its realization is omniscience.

original: ye shes de dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bdag med ces bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes de dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bdag med ces bya'o //
translated: Because it possesses that intuition, it is said that Buddhahood is self.

original: de lta bas na bdag ni mchog tu zab pa'i sku gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩrmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes //
analyzed: de lta bas na bdag ni mchog tu zab pa'i sku gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes //
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that I am the essence of the two most profound bodies,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, Because of delusion, I am not known, etc.

original: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang mi ldan pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang mi ldan pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral ba'o //
translated: Delusion means lack of learning and lack of service to the spiritual friend.

original: de lta bu'i zab mo'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gnyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bu'i zab mo'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gnyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the two bodies, which are such an essence of profundity, it is said,

original: bde chen gnas der rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: bde chen gnas der rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: Always dwells in that place of great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de @39b bzhin gshegs pa 'dod dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bde ba can zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de @39b bzhin gshegs pa 'dod dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bde ba can zhes brjod do //
translated: The buddha-field of the Tathagata Amitabha is called Sukhavati.

original: 'dir ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'i bha ga la bde ba can zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'i bha ga la bde ba can zhes bya ste /
translated: Here, the bhaga of Nairatmya and so forth is called Sukhavati.

original: mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin gyi blan med pa'i bde ba srung bar byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin gyi blan med pa'i bde ba srung bar byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it protects the unsurpassed bliss of the nature of the essence.

original: dir bdag gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dir bdag gnas pa'o //
translated: Here, I dwell.

original: bde ba chen po'i gzugs su gcig par chos thams cad mtshon par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gzugs su gcig par chos thams cad mtshon par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to illustrate all dharmas as one in the form of great bliss,

original: ae yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs //
analyzed: ae yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs //
translated: The form of the aspect of E.

original: zhes pa'o // sangs rgyas nyid ni rin po che'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // sangs rgyas nyid ni rin po che'o //
translated: Buddhahood is the jewel.

original: de'i za ma tog ni gzhag pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de'i za ma tog ni gzhag pa'i gnas so //
translated: Its casket is the place of placement.

original: da ni de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the greatness of such a nature,

original: 'chad pa po bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'chad pa po bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The expounder, myself, and so forth is stated.

original: 'di lta bu'i chos dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa 'chad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i chos dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa 'chad par byed pa'o //
translated: Such a Dharma is Hevajra, etc.

original: nyan pa zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob ma'o //
analyzed: nyan pa zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob ma'o //
translated: The hearer is the qualified disciple.

original: bsgrub bya bdag ces bya ba ni gang sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya bdag ces bya ba ni gang sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: The attainer is the one who was previously taught.

original: de'i sgrub pa po yang bdag nyid yin ba'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa po yang bdag nyid yin ba'o //
translated: And the attainer is oneself.

original: 'gro ba'i ston pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dag ste bdag nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i ston pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dag ste bdag nyid yin pa'o //
translated: The teacher of the world is the enjoyment body, and that is oneself.

original: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnyi ga spros pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten no //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnyi ga spros pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten no //
translated: The mundane and supramundane and so on: The mundane arises from elaboration.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de dag nyid rgyur gyur ba'i byang chub sems khu ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de dag nyid rgyur gyur ba'i byang chub sems khu ba ste /
translated: The supramundane is the bodhicitta that becomes the cause of those.

original: 'di 'jig rten la dgos pa'i phyir dang / longs spyod rdzogs sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di 'jig rten la dgos pa'i phyir dang / longs spyod rdzogs sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas bdag nyid yin no //
translated: This is the purpose of the world, and because it is the essence of the enjoyment body, it is oneself.

original: gal te khyod gtsor bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin na de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: gal te khyod gtsor bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin na de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: If you are primarily the essence of great bliss, what is that like?

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The simultaneously born bliss, etc.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de khyad pa rje lta bu can zhig ce na /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de khyad pa rje lta bu can zhig ce na /
translated: If one asks, Is that simultaneously born bliss like a lord?

original: mchog mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mchog mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The supreme bliss, etc.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtha' dag 'bral gyi dang po gang yin pa de de nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtha' dag 'bral gyi dang po gang yin pa de de nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is that which is the first of the supreme bliss, the totality of the bliss of separation.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bde ba chen po kun gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa de nyid khyod yin zhes sngar gsungs pas 'khor ba pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba de ni bsgrub bya ma yin na'ang /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bde ba chen po kun gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa de nyid khyod yin zhes sngar gsungs pas 'khor ba pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba de ni bsgrub bya ma yin na'ang /
translated: If one asks, If that which is to be accomplished is the nature of all great bliss, then you are that, as was said before, then that simultaneously born bliss of the transmigrators is not to be accomplished,

original: de ji ltar khyod nyid yin par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar khyod nyid yin par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how can it be you?

original: de bzhin bus kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin bus kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The just so of just so, etc.

original: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The word just so is a reason.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid gtsor dpes bstan par bya ba yin @40a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid gtsor dpes bstan par bya ba yin @40a * //
translated: Because that is to be taught primarily by means of an example.

original: pas 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i dpe nyid gyis rab tu bsgrub par bya ba yin pas de nyid ni gtsor bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: pas 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i dpe nyid gyis rab tu bsgrub par bya ba yin pas de nyid ni gtsor bstan pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the example itself is the proof of the similarity.

original: 'di ni nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: That is the principal teaching, and this is a secondary designation.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩmun pa la ni mar me bzhin //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / mun pa la ni mar me bzhin //
translated: In order to teach just that,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúLike a lamp in the darkness,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig ji ltar mun pa'i yul na gnas pa'i bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa rnams me sgron gyis gsal bar byed par bsgrub pa ltar /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ji ltar mun pa'i yul na gnas pa'i bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa rnams me sgron gyis gsal bar byed par bsgrub pa ltar /
translated: Just as a lamp illuminates a pot, a cloth, and so on that are located in a dark place,

original: de bzhin du dpar gyur pa 'jig rten pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po sgrub par byed pa yin par blta bar bya'o ;üîΩ/ bde gnas su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar gsungs pa de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpar gyur pa 'jig rten pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po sgrub par byed pa yin par blta bar bya'o ; / bde gnas su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar gsungs pa de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: so one should view the example, the innate bliss of the world, as the means of accomplishing the bliss of the definition of the object to be accomplished.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to clarify just that which was previously stated, he says, ‚ÄúThe thirty-two,‚Äù and so on.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar ba'i sku'o //
translated: The body blazes with the major and minor marks.

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bdag po'o //

original: rigs gcig ni zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs gcig nyid la'o //üîΩrigs kyi tshogs la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs kyi tshegs la ste /
analyzed: rigs gcig ni zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs gcig nyid la'o // rigs kyi tshogs la zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs kyi tshegs la ste /
translated: One clan means just one Tathagata clan.üîΩA collection of clans means a collection of Tathagata clans.

original: de bzhin gshes pa'i rigs kyi tshogs can gyi rigs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshes pa'i rigs kyi tshogs can gyi rigs te /

original: rigs de las rigs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs de las rigs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

original: rigs 'bum so so las kyang rigs bye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs 'bum so so las kyang rigs bye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From each of those hundred thousand clans, ten million clans will arise.

original: de dag las kyang rigs gzhan grangs med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag las kyang rigs gzhan grangs med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From those, other innumerable clans will arise.

original: de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
translated: The dakini is the Vajra dakini.

original: de'i dra ba ni tshogs te dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de'i dra ba ni tshogs te dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Her net is a collection, the mandala wheel.

original: de'i sdom pa ni bde ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: de'i sdom pa ni bde ba'i mchog go //
translated: Its vow is the supreme bliss.

original: de'i phyir dngos grub ces bya ste de gtan la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos grub ces bya ste de gtan la dbab pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúpower,‚Äù and that is the conclusion.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel ba'o /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las le'u gnyis pa'i 'grel ba'o /

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang de //üîΩrgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi ni dgyes pa rdo rje'i @42a * //

translated: Now, the one called ‚ÄúVajra-holder‚Äù is Vajradhara.

original: rgyud kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: The nidana of all tantras is from the point of view of the tantra of Hevajra.

original: de'i ched du byas pa'i dang por bstan pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de'i ched du byas pa'i dang por bstan pa'i rgyud do //

original: zhes bya ba ni ming de skad ces bya bar rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ming de skad ces bya bar rab tu grags pa'o //

original: thabs zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: thabs zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs so //
translated: ‚ÄúMeans‚Äù is the means of accomplishing perfect complete enlightenment.

original: de nyid mdor bstan pa'i phyir sdom ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid mdor bstan pa'i phyir sdom ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just that in brief, he says ‚Äúvow‚Äù and so forth.

original: sdom pa ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
analyzed: sdom pa ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
translated: Vow is the exalted wisdom of great bliss.

original: dbang ni dbang rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: dbang ni dbang rnam pa bzhi'o //

original: dgongs pa'i skad ni mngon par dgongs pa'i skad nyid do //
analyzed: dgongs pa'i skad ni mngon par dgongs pa'i skad nyid do //

original: dga' ba dang zhes bya ba ni dga' ba rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang zhes bya ba ni dga' ba rnam pa bzhi'o //

original: skad cig dbye ba zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: skad cig dbye ba zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: The division of the moment is the fourfold moment.

analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa nyid kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, is the practice of non-elaboration.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa dag pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa dag pa'o //
translated: Again is the purity of the eyes, etc.

original: bza' ba ni slob dpon gyis so //üîΩsogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par bya ba'i tshigs bcad bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni slob dpon gyis so // sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par bya ba'i tshigs bcad bsdu ba'o //
translated: The food is the master.üîΩThe word etc. includes the verses to be ascertained.

original: sdom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sdom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the verse beginning with vow,

original: gang gis sdom pa zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis sdom pa zhe na /
translated: by what is the vow?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By all the buddhas,

original: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas kun la tha dad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas kun la tha dad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because all buddhas are non-different by the nature of great bliss.

original: ae wam rnam par zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ae wam rnam par zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya la gnas pa'o //

original: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /

original: dbang las yang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang las yang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya zhing rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i zhes bya ba ni d'a d'a ni mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i skad kyi dbyings kyis 'dir brtags nas /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i zhes bya ba ni d'a d'a ni mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i skad kyi dbyings kyis 'dir brtags nas /
translated: ‚Äú ·∏åƒÅkinƒ´‚Äù is a feminine noun meaning ‚Äúshe who moves in the sky.‚Äù

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub pa thams cad la mkha' 'gro zhes kla klo'i skad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yin pas /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub pa thams cad la mkha' 'gro zhes kla klo'i skad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yin pas /
translated: Here, having analyzed, the Blessed One taught in the barbarian language that ‚Äúsky-goer‚Äù is the accomplishment of all who move in the sky.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Thus, the ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´ is Vajrayoginƒ´.

original: de dag sdom pa ni mchog tu mdor bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag sdom pa ni mchog tu mdor bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Their vow is the supreme, concise one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ngo bo nyid gcig par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ngo bo nyid gcig par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the single essence of the body, speech, and mind of all tathƒÅgatas,

original: ae'i rnam pa'i cha byad do //
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa'i cha byad do //
translated: it is the form of the letter e.

original: 'di la bzang po yod pas na bzang po ste /
analyzed: 'di la bzang po yod pas na bzang po ste /
translated: Since there is good in this, it is good.

original: bam gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: bam gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: It is the form of va·πÉ.

original: brgyan pa ni des padma'i bre'u 'bru mdzes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: brgyan pa ni des padma'i bre'u 'bru mdzes par byas pa'o //
translated: Adorned means beautified by that.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni rten no //
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni rten no //
translated: The abode is the support.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The jewel of the Buddha, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ni snod du gyur ba la de skad ces @42b bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ni snod du gyur ba la de skad ces @42b bya ste /
translated: The five Tathagatas are so called in regard to the vessel,

original: de dag gi rten gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rten gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the intrinsic nature of its support.

original: dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur //
translated: Joy arises from that.

original: skad cig dbye bas phye ba yi //
analyzed: skad cig dbye bas phye ba yi //
translated: It is differentiated by the differentiation of moments.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'o //

original: gal te dga' ba nyid yod par gyur na skad cig ma'i dbye bas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dga' ba nyid yod par gyur na skad cig ma'i dbye bas ci zhig bya zhe na /

original: skad cig shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: skad cig shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The verse states, ‚ÄúHaving known the moment, etc. ‚Äù

original: skad cig ma rnams kyis rang gi ngo bo shes na ni dga' ba rnams kyis bde ba'i byed pa yongs su shes par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma rnams kyis rang gi ngo bo shes na ni dga' ba rnams kyis bde ba'i byed pa yongs su shes par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If one knows the intrinsic nature of the moments, one will know the function of bliss by means of the joys,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: but not otherwise. This is the idea.

original: skad cig ma'i dbye ba de dag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i dbye ba de dag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /

original: sna tshogs dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sna tshogs dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúvarious,‚Äù etc.

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba sna tshogs pa la mkhas pa ste slob dpon gyi las so //
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba sna tshogs pa la mkhas pa ste slob dpon gyi las so //
translated: ‚ÄúVarious‚Äù is skill in the various, the activity of the master.

original: rnam smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúRipened,‚Äù etc.

original: de las zlog ces bya ba ni de dang mi 'dra bar gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de las zlog ces bya ba ni de dang mi 'dra bar gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOpposite from that‚Äù is not like that.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
translated: ‚ÄúWisdom‚Äù is the wisdom of great bliss.

original: de za ba ni de nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de za ba ni de nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEating that‚Äù is experiencing that.

original: rnam par nyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam par nyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúDissolving,‚Äù etc.

original: bros zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa zhig pa dran pa'o //
analyzed: bros zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa zhig pa dran pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEscaping‚Äù is remembering what has just passed away.

original: yang na shes pa so sor rtogs pa ni zos zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yang na shes pa so sor rtogs pa ni zos zhes bya ste /
translated: Or, ‚Äúindividually discerning consciousness‚Äù is called ‚Äúeating.‚Äù

original: bdag gis bde ba spyad par gyur to zhes sngar gyi nges par 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bde ba spyad par gyur to zhes sngar gyi nges par 'dzin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI have experienced bliss‚Äù is the ascertainment of what has gone before.

original: mtshan nyid bral ba zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa gsum po'i'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bral ba zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa gsum po'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFree from characteristics‚Äù is that of the three previously taught.

original: chags dang chags bral zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The attachment and non-attachment is the freedom from cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: sna tshogs dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dga' ba rnam pa bzhi dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag par byed de /
analyzed: sna tshogs dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dga' ba rnam pa bzhi dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag par byed de /
translated: The variety and so forth establish the four consecrations of the four joys.

original: dga' ba so sos kyang slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab dang bzhi pa zhes bya bar thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba so sos kyang slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab dang bzhi pa zhes bya bar thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: It is the thought that by each joy, one attains the name of master, secret, wisdom, and fourth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dga' ba sogs pas bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dga' ba sogs pas bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: For that very reason, the joy and so forth are mentioned.

original: rim zhes bya zhes bya ba ni dga' ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rim zhes bya zhes bya ba ni dga' ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The sequence is that joy is the consecration of the master.

original: mchog tu dga' ba ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo ;
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo ;
translated: Supreme joy is the secret consecration.

original: dga' bral ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: dga' bral ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo //
translated: Joy-free is the wisdom consecration.

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni dbang bskur ba bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni dbang bskur ba bzhi pa'o //
translated: The connate is the fourth consecration.

original: de ltar dbang bskur ba bzhi so so dang skad cig ma bzhi dang dga' ba bzhi bla ma'i man ngag las sbyar ba shes rab bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar dbang bskur ba bzhi so so dang skad cig ma bzhi dang dga' ba bzhi bla ma'i man ngag las sbyar ba shes rab bya ste /
translated: Thus, one should understand from the guru's instructions the four initiations, the four moments, and the four joys, which are to be applied in the four initiations.

original: de ltar na dbang bzhi'i rnam grangs shes par bya'o //üîΩrgod @43a * //
analyzed: de ltar na dbang bzhi'i rnam grangs shes par bya'o // rgod @43a * //
translated: Thus, one should understand the enumeration of the four initiations.

original: pa'i dag pas zhes bya ba la sogs ni dbang gi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: pa'i dag pas zhes bya ba la sogs ni dbang gi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The purity of laughter, etc., refers to the purity of the initiations.

original: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu ni lha rnams thabs dang shes rab kyi rjes su chags pas dgod pa bstan te /
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu ni lha rnams thabs dang shes rab kyi rjes su chags pas dgod pa bstan te /
translated: In some Action Tantras, etc., the gods are taught to laugh through their passion for method and wisdom.

original: de rnam par dag pa ni slob dpon zhes bya ba slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de rnam par dag pa ni slob dpon zhes bya ba slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Its purity is the master initiation, called the master.

original: spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu ni thabs dang shes rab rjes su chags pa ston par byed phan tshun lta ba 'byung ba ste de'i rnam par dag pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu ni thabs dang shes rab rjes su chags pa ston par byed phan tshun lta ba 'byung ba ste de'i rnam par dag pa ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: In some Practice Tantras, etc., they are taught to look at each other with passion for method and wisdom. Its purity is the secret initiation.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu thabs dang shes rab phan tshun 'khyud pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa kha cig tu thabs dang shes rab phan tshun 'khyud pa 'byung ste /
translated: In some tantras such as the Yoga Tantra, the union of method and wisdom is taught.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Its purification is the wisdom initiation.

original: rnal 'byor bla na med ces bya ba la sogs pa kha cig tu thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa 'byung bas de'i rnam par dag pa ni dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhi'o //üîΩde'i phyir / dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla na med ces bya ba la sogs pa kha cig tu thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa 'byung bas de'i rnam par dag pa ni dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhi'o // de'i phyir / dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad //
translated: In some tantras such as the Highest Yoga Tantra, the union of method and wisdom is taught. Its purification is the four initiations.üîΩTherefore,

original: ces gsungs te ;
analyzed: ces gsungs te ;
translated: the four initiations are explained.

original: bzhi ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: bzhi ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: Four means fourfold.

original: bshad ces bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'dir te rnal 'byor ma bla na med pa'i rgyud 'dir skal pa dang ldan par byas na thams cad la dbang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'dir te rnal 'byor ma bla na med pa'i rgyud 'dir skal pa dang ldan par byas na thams cad la dbang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Explained means in this tantra of Hevajra, in this Highest Yoga Tantra of Yoginƒ´, because all are empowered if one is fortunate.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚Äúin order to benefit all sentient beings.‚Äù

original: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩdes na dbang brjod par bya //
analyzed: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don bstan pa'i phyir / des na dbang brjod par bya //
translated: The empowerment is taught for the sake of indicating the meaning of the word.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, the empowerment should be expressed.üîΩThe meaning of empowerment is as follows:

original: blugs shing bkrus te dri ma med par byas //üîΩzhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blugs shing bkrus te dri ma med par byas // zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is poured, washed, and made stainless.

original: lag pa dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ste /üîΩrdo rje dril bus mnyam par sbyor ba'i lag pas sam /
analyzed: lag pa dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba gsungs pa ste / rdo rje dril bus mnyam par sbyor ba'i lag pas sam /
translated: The empowerment of the master is taught by with the hands, etc.üîΩIt is the empowerment of the master according to the instructions, with the hands joined in the union of vajra and bell,

original: padma dang rdo rje dag gis te man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba yin no //
analyzed: padma dang rdo rje dag gis te man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba yin no //
translated: or with the lotus and vajra.

original: shin tu bzhin bzangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir shes rab kyi ngo bo gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: shin tu bzhin bzangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir shes rab kyi ngo bo gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The essence of wisdom is taught by very beautiful, etc. for the sake of the empowerment of wisdom.

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang srin lag dag gis snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro slob ma'i khar 'dzud cing gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad brjod pa ste bshad pa gcig yin no //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang srin lag dag gis snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro slob ma'i khar 'dzud cing gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad brjod pa ste bshad pa gcig yin no //
translated: The thumb and ring finger of the left hand are joined, and the taste of union is placed in the disciple's mouth, and the verse of the secret initiation is recited. This is one explanation.

original: yang na mthe bo zhes bya ba ni la la n'a'o //
analyzed: yang na mthe bo zhes bya ba ni la la n'a'o //
translated: Or else, thumb is the lalana.

original: srin lag ces bya ba ni ra sa n'a'o //
analyzed: srin lag ces bya ba ni ra sa n'a'o //
translated: Ring finger is the rasana.

original: de gnyis nas slob ma'i rdo rje nor @43b bu'i sgor shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'bab pa de'i man ngag bstan pa'o //üîΩde nyid du ni bya ba ste //
analyzed: de gnyis nas slob ma'i rdo rje nor @43b bu'i sgor shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'bab pa de'i man ngag bstan pa'o // de nyid du ni bya ba ste //
translated: From those two, the descent of the bodhicitta of wisdom into the disciple's vajra jewel is the teaching of the intimate instruction.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The verse beginning there itself is as follows.

original: de nyid du ni zhes bya ba ni shes rab gang la man ngag bstan pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nyid du ni zhes bya ba ni shes rab gang la man ngag bstan pa nyid la'o //
translated: There itself refers to the wisdom in which the intimate instruction is taught.

original: ro mnyam zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dag gi byang chub kyi sems yang dag bar 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: ro mnyam zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dag gi byang chub kyi sems yang dag bar 'byor ba'o //
translated: Equal taste refers to the correct union of the bodhicitta of method and wisdom.

original: slob ma'i spyod yul zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i yul du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slob ma'i spyod yul zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i yul du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The domain of the disciple is the object of discernment.

original: 'di lta bu ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: This is the secret consecration.

original: ston pas shes rab ces gsungs pa ni rgyud nas gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ston pas shes rab ces gsungs pa ni rgyud nas gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The teacher who is called wisdom is one who has the characteristics taught in the tantras.

original: mchod ces bya ba ni dang por ro //
analyzed: mchod ces bya ba ni dang por ro //
translated: The word worship means first of all.

original: ston pa zhes bya ba ni bla ma ste /
analyzed: ston pa zhes bya ba ni bla ma ste /
translated: The word teacher means guru.

original: dka' bar gyur pa'i las rnams kyi khur bzod dam mi bzod ces brtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dka' bar gyur pa'i las rnams kyi khur bzod dam mi bzod ces brtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to examine whether or not he can bear the burden of difficult tasks.

original: de nas rgyud nas gsungs pa'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs bcad brjod nas gtad par bya'o //üîΩphyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer //
analyzed: de nas rgyud nas gsungs pa'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs bcad brjod nas gtad par bya'o // phyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer //

original: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Bearing the seal of bliss means the Dharma seal.

original: 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: This is the wisdom consecration.

original: slob ma che 'gyur shes nas ni //
analyzed: slob ma che 'gyur shes nas ni //
translated: Having known the disciple to be great,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: che 'gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi snod du gyur ba'o //
analyzed: che 'gyur zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi snod du gyur ba'o //
translated: The word great means having become a vessel for the accomplishment of the great seal.

original: phrag dog spangs zhes bya ba ni ser sna dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: phrag dog spangs zhes bya ba ni ser sna dang bral ba'o //
translated: Having abandoned envy means being free from avarice.

original: khro ba rnam spangs zhes bya ba ni snying rje chan po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: khro ba rnam spangs zhes bya ba ni snying rje chan po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Having abandoned anger means having great compassion.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni slob ma la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni slob ma la'o //
translated: There means to the disciple.

original: snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba ni man ngag bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba ni man ngag bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Give light means I will teach the esoteric instructions, is the meaning.

original: 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste dbang po gnyis sbyor zhes kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste dbang po gnyis sbyor zhes kyang ngo //
translated: One should also say, Join the two organs.

original: sbyor zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste gyis shig cas bya ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste gyis shig cas bya ba'o //
translated: Join means the meditative concentration of the great seal, and do means do it.

original: rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Vajra holder means Vajradhara, is the meaning.

original: dbang bskur ba bzhi pa'o //üîΩda ni dbang gi don du slob mas ji ltar mnyes par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba bzhi pa'o // da ni dbang gi don du slob mas ji ltar mnyes par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /

original: slob ma'i bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: slob ma'i bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach how the disciple should please the master for the sake of consecration, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares the disciple's duties, etc.

original: gsol ba gdab ces bya ba ni don du gnyer bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab ces bya ba ni don du gnyer bar bya'o //
translated: Make a request means should be sought.

original: bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye //
analyzed: bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye //
translated: BhagavƒÅn, great peace, O!

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bla ma la bstod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bla ma la bstod pa'o //
translated: etc. is praise of the guru.

original: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor la nges par gnas pa'i phyir zhi ba chen po'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor la nges par gnas pa'i phyir zhi ba chen po'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúgreat peace‚Äù because it is definitely based on the yoga of nonduality.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje'o //
translated: ‚ÄúVajra‚Äù is adamantine.

original: rnal 'byor ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúYoga‚Äù is a special meditative absorption.

original: der gcig tu gtad pa gcig bzhed pa'o //üîΩphyag rgya @44a * //
analyzed: der gcig tu gtad pa gcig bzhed pa'o // phyag rgya @44a * //
translated: ‚ÄúEntrusting it to that‚Äù means entrusting it to the one.

original: sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la phyag rgya ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la phyag rgya ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSeal‚Äù means the four seals.

original: sgrub pa po ni yongs su mnyes par byed pa po'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni yongs su mnyes par byed pa po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe practitioner‚Äù is the one who delights.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir mi phyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIndivisible‚Äù means having the nature of emptiness.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúVajra‚Äù means the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de dag gi rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: de dag gi rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: ‚ÄúTheir yoga‚Äù is meditative absorption.

original: de las yang dag par byung ba'o ;üîΩ/ ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de las yang dag par byung ba'o ; / ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from that‚Äù means arisen from that.

original: ji ltar khyod 'gro ba la phan pa'i rgyu yin pa ltar ro //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod 'gro ba la phan pa'i rgyu yin pa ltar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as you are the cause of benefitting migrating beings,‚Äù

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du'o //
translated: ‚Äújust so‚Äù means in that way.

original: mnga' bdag ces bya ba ni gtso bo'o //
analyzed: mnga' bdag ces bya ba ni gtso bo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLord‚Äù means chief.

original: 'dam dang 'dra ba ni 'dam ste 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: 'dam dang 'dra ba ni 'dam ste 'khor ba'o //
translated: The mud is samsara.

original: chogs zhes bya ba ni spungs pa'o //
analyzed: chogs zhes bya ba ni spungs pa'o //
translated: The heap is a collection.

original: der bying ba bdag la skyobs zhes bya ba skyabs mdzod cig pa ste /
analyzed: der bying ba bdag la skyobs zhes bya ba skyabs mdzod cig pa ste /
translated: Having sunk into that, protect me, that is, save me.

original: skyabs med bdag la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: skyabs med bdag la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning is, ‚ÄúI have no refuge.‚Äù

original: zhim pa'i zhes bya ba ni shin tu zhim par sems pa'o //
analyzed: zhim pa'i zhes bya ba ni shin tu zhim par sems pa'o //
translated: Delicious means very delicious.

original: bza' ba btung ba dang zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba btung ba dang zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: Food and drink is a brief explanation.

original: chang dang sha chen zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: chang dang sha chen zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: Wine and human flesh is an extensive explanation.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa ste bla ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa ste bla ma'o //
translated: Vajra holder is the guru, who holds the nondual gnosis.

original: mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Supreme joy, etc.

original: thob ces bya ba ni shin tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thob ces bya ba ni shin tu gnas pa'o //

original: sna tshogs spangs pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs spangs pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o //

original: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni slob mas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bde ba ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni slob mas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bde ba ste /
translated: Great being is bliss for the disciple to realize.

original: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
analyzed: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
translated: This intuition is most subtle,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
translated: and so forth, with these verses.

original: bde ba chen po'i rnam par zung //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rnam par zung //

original: zhes bya ba ni man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su gnang ba sbyin ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su gnang ba sbyin ba'o //

original: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pas ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su gnang ba mdor bstan to //
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pas ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su gnang ba mdor bstan to //

original: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba'o //

original: bya ba kun zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i tshogs so //
analyzed: bya ba kun zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i tshogs so //

original: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //

original: 'di skad smra zhes bya ba ni ci zhig smra zhe na /
analyzed: 'di skad smra zhes bya ba ni ci zhig smra zhe na /

original: 'di nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste 'di nyid ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes chen po nyid do //
analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste 'di nyid ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes chen po nyid do //
translated: This itself, etc. This itself is the very great innate intuition which is obtained through the consecration.

original: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi lus la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi lus la gnas pa'o //

original: gnyis su med pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su snang ba dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su snang ba dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: Non-dual is free from the appearance of the duality of method and wisdom.

original: gnyis ni de dag nyid @44b kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: gnyis ni de dag nyid @44b kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The two are the nature of those two.

original: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba dang // dga' ba dang dga' bral gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid ces bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba dang // dga' ba dang dga' bral gyi ngo bo'o //

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni dga' ba gsum pos las mchog tu 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni dga' ba gsum pos las mchog tu 'gyur ba'o //

original: brtan ni chos dang dam tshig phyag rgya bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: brtan ni chos dang dam tshig phyag rgya bsgoms pa'o //

original: g-yo ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The moving is the union with the external seal.

original: de dag thams cad la khyab nas gnas pa yang 'di nyid do //
analyzed: de dag thams cad la khyab nas gnas pa yang 'di nyid do //
translated: This very [mind] pervades and abides in all of those.

original: sgyu ma'i gzugs can zhes bya ba ni sprul pa sna tshogs lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i gzugs can zhes bya ba ni sprul pa sna tshogs lta bu'o //
translated: The illusory form is like various emanations.

original: de lta na 'di thabs gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'di thabs gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: In that case, by what method is this accomplished?

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: The wheel of the ma·πá·∏çala and so on is said.

original: sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni phyag rgya gnyis kyi man ngag dang / dpa' bo gcig bu la sogs pa la mos pa yang bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni phyag rgya gnyis kyi man ngag dang / dpa' bo gcig bu la sogs pa la mos pa yang bsdu'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the esoteric instructions of the two seals and the devotion to the single hero and so on.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgras phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag gzung ngo //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgras phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag gzung ngo //
translated: Or, the esoteric instructions of the great seal are included by the word ‚Äúwheel‚Äù in the ‚Äúwheel of the ma·πá·∏çala.‚Äù

original: bzod pa gsol nas zhes bya ba ni bzod par gyis shig ces byas nas /
analyzed: bzod pa gsol nas zhes bya ba ni bzod par gyis shig ces byas nas /
translated: Having requested forbearance, having said ‚ÄúPlease forgive me,‚Äù

original: gsol to zhes bya ba ni zhus par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gsol to zhes bya ba ni zhus par gyur ba'o //
translated: having requested, having asked.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gang bar gyur bas na grong khyer ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gang bar gyur bas na grong khyer ro //
translated: The city is filled with all the buddhas.

original: ci zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúwhat‚Äù? It means ‚Äúfor what reason.‚Äù

original: 'khrul gyur bas zhes bya ba ni bdag the tshom dang ldan par gyur ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khrul gyur bas zhes bya ba ni bdag the tshom dang ldan par gyur ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having erred means ‚ÄúI have become doubtful.‚Äù

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil zhes bya ba ni snying po zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil zhes bya ba ni snying po zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs so //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala, etc., is a synonym for the essence.

original: snying po de ci zhig che na /
analyzed: snying po de ci zhig che na /
translated: What is the essence?

original: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
translated: The mind of enlightenment is great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: It is characterized by freedom from the suffering produced by all the afflictions and secondary afflictions.

original: de len pa ni bdag gir byed pa'o //
analyzed: de len pa ni bdag gir byed pa'o //
translated: Its appropriation is its ownership.

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes so //
translated: By that means by the intuition of great bliss.

original: 'dus pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba ste /
translated: Union is the union with all the Buddhas.

original: 'di lta bu ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the ultimate ma·πá·∏çala.

original: 'khor lo ltar zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'khor lo ltar zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Like a wheel means having the nature of great bliss.

original: gnas zhes pa ni snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: gnas zhes pa ni snying rje chen po'o //

original: nam mkha'i khams ni chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: The realm of space is the emptiness of all things.

original: yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong zhes bya ba ni de dag ro gcig par gyur pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid do //üîΩrdo rje ni @45a * //
analyzed: yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong zhes bya ba ni de dag ro gcig par gyur pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid do // rdo rje ni @45a * //
translated: Purifying the objects, etc. means that they become of one taste, having the nature of clear light.

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems rdo rje'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems rdo rje'o //

original: padma ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: padma ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //

original: de dag man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de dag man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'o //

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i de'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i de'o //
translated: The his is of the great seal.

original: bde ba ni 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: bde ba ni 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can no //

original: shes par gyur ces bya ba ni rtogs par gyur nas zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: kye lha mo rnams ci 'di dag rtogs par ma gyur tam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kye lha mo rnams ci 'di dag rtogs par ma gyur tam zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid bstan pa'o //

original: gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa //
analyzed: gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa //

analyzed: sa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i ngal sos pas ni shin tu dbugs thon pa'o //

analyzed: sogs ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni khro ba dang 'dod pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //

analyzed: de yang gang so so'i skye bo de kho na nyid de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sangs rgyas nyid ni sems can thams cad do //

original: gal te gang bla na med pa'i tshor ba'i bde ba de lha la sogs pa rnams la ni yod pas sangs rgyas su gyur du chug na dmyal ba la sogs pa la ni de lta bu'i bde ba'i tshor ba med pas ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gang bla na med pa'i tshor ba'i bde ba de lha la sogs pa rnams la ni yod pas sangs rgyas su gyur du chug na dmyal ba la sogs pa la ni de lta bu'i bde ba'i tshor ba med pas ma yin no zhe na /

analyzed: dmyal ba yi dgas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du'o //

analyzed: bde ba ni tshogs pa las skyes par 'gyur zhing tshogs pa las 'byung bar 'gyur la tshogs pa dang bral na ni ma yin zhe na /

analyzed: rang bzhin bde ba can zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: bde ba'i rigs su gcig par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: gal te lha la sogs pa'i bde ba ji lta ba de lta bu dmyal ba la sogs pa la ni med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te lha la sogs pa'i bde ba ji lta ba de lta bu dmyal ba la sogs pa la ni med do zhe na /

original: med du zad de /
analyzed: med du zad de /

original: bde ba gang phyir mi shes pas //
analyzed: bde ba gang phyir mi shes pas //

original: lha dang lha min mi rnams la //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lha dang lha min mi rnams la // zhes bya ba ste /

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i bde ba la bde ba'i ngo bo nyid mi gzigs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i bde ba la bde ba'i ngo bo nyid mi gzigs te /

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sdug ba snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sdug ba snyam du dgongs so //

original: de lta bas na bde ba chen po'i nyid bde ba yin la de yang thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du @52b gyur par mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na bde ba chen po'i nyid bde ba yin la de yang thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du @52b gyur par mnyam pa yin no //

original: sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur //

original: 'dir zhu ba po rdo rje snying po'o //

analyzed: chu khams sha ba r'i ra bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de lta bas na sems kho na gti mug ste /

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad yin no // de ni tsanda l'ir bshad pa //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: 'dod chags phyag rgyas zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgyas so //

analyzed: khrag ces bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog ste /

original: de nyid rin chen 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid rin chen 'byung gnas so //
translated: That itself is Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: khyad par ji lta bu can zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu can zhig ce na /

original: bud med rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa @56a * //
analyzed: bud med rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa @56a * //
translated: She says of women, etc.

original: gsungs te go sla'o //
analyzed: gsungs te go sla'o //

original: da ni nga yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'o //
analyzed: da ni nga yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'o //

original: rnal 'byor bdag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnal 'byor bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bdag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnal 'byor bdag nyid do //

analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnam pa bzhi'o //

original: rig byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rig byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom mo //

original: mthar ni phat dang sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: mthar ni phat dang sv'a h'a'o //
translated: At the end, phat and svƒÅhƒÅ.

original: zhus pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: zhus pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The one who requests is the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bris pa'i 'khor ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bris pa'i 'khor ro //

original: de la zhes bya ba ni dgyes par gyur nas so //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni dgyes par gyur nas so //
translated: There, he, having become pleased,üîΩthe teacher,

original: ston pa zhes bya ba la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ston pa zhes bya ba la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: having spoken, the rest.

original: ye shes che zhes bya ba ni slob dpon de nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad ces bya ba ste /

original: gzhan ni ri mo mkhan la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ste dang por ro //

analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba ni ri mos brgyan pas so //

analyzed: don gyis ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang las thams cad pa'i bum pa yang yin na //

original: dkyil 'khor tshon ci zhig gis bri bar bya ba zhe na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor tshon ci zhig gis bri bar bya ba zhe na /
translated: With what colors should the ma·πá·∏çala be drawn?

original: gsungs pa / rin chen lnga'i zhes bya ba ste de'i rang bzhin ni mchog go //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rin chen lnga'i zhes bya ba ste de'i rang bzhin ni mchog go //

analyzed: 'bras la sogs pa ni bar ma'o //

original: dur khrod kyi so dpag la sogs pa ni tha ma'o //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi so dpag la sogs pa ni tha ma'o //

original: de'i dbus zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su'o //

original: skyes ba'i thod pa zhes bya ba ni mi nyid kyi thod pa'o //üîΩshar ba ni seng ge'o //
analyzed: skyes ba'i thod pa zhes bya ba ni mi nyid kyi thod pa'o // shar ba ni seng ge'o //

original: lto 'phye zhes bya ba ni sprul lo //
analyzed: lto 'phye zhes bya ba ni sprul lo //

original: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha mo rnams kyi kha dog ci lta ba de ltar phyag mtshan yang bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha mo rnams kyi kha dog ci lta ba de ltar phyag mtshan yang bri bar bya'o //
translated: With regard to the goddesses, etc. , the implements should be drawn in the same colors as the goddesses.

original: dbus su gnas pa'i thod pa la sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su gnas pa'i thod pa la sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa bri bar bya'o //

original: rnam rgyal bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam rgyal bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: shar du gzhag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: shar du gzhag ces bya ba'o //

original: shugs kyis na lha mo rnams kyi bum pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya zhes bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: shugs kyis na lha mo rnams kyi bum pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya zhes bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bstan pa'i don to //

original: dkyil 'khor du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug ces bya ba ni bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug ces bya ba ni bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: In the ma·πá·∏çala and so on. Enter means to reside.

original: brgyad gnyis lon pa zhes bya ba ni bcu drug lon pa ste /
analyzed: brgyad gnyis lon pa zhes bya ba ni bcu drug lon pa ste /
translated: Having reached the age of sixteen means having reached sixteen years.

original: rig ma brgyad po bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig ma brgyad po bstan par 'gyur ro //

original: gang dag ce na ma dang zhes bya ba @56b gsungs te /
analyzed: gang dag ce na ma dang zhes bya ba @56b gsungs te /

original: 'di dag 'jig rten gyi 'brel pas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di dag 'jig rten gyi 'brel pas ma yin gyi /

original: bla ma'i 'grel pas yin no //
analyzed: bla ma'i 'grel pas yin no //

original: ma zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis gang bzhed pa slob ma'i ma yin no //
analyzed: ma zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis gang bzhed pa slob ma'i ma yin no //

original: srin mo zhes bya ba ni de dang lhan cig spyod pa'o //
analyzed: srin mo zhes bya ba ni de dang lhan cig spyod pa'o //
translated: The demoness is the one who practices with him.

original: bu mo zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi slob ma'o //üîΩzhang po'i chung ma zhes bya ba ni ma'i snying du sdug par gyur pa'i grogs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bu mo zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi slob ma'o // zhang po'i chung ma zhes bya ba ni ma'i snying du sdug par gyur pa'i grogs zhes pa'o //
translated: The daughter is the disciple of the master.üîΩThe wife of the maternal uncle is the friend who is dear to the mother.

original: ma'i spun dang zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi grogs su gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ma'i spun dang zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi grogs su gyur ba'o //

original: sgyug mo zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i snying du sdug pa'o //
analyzed: sgyug mo zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i snying du sdug pa'o //

original: pha'i sring mo ni slob dpon gyi sring mo'o //
analyzed: pha'i sring mo ni slob dpon gyi sring mo'o //

original: 'di rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor ma ni slob dpon no //
analyzed: 'di rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor ma ni slob dpon no //
translated: The yogi·πáƒ´ is the teacher.

original: ji ltar gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid bsdus par ro //
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid bsdus par ro //

original: mchod dang bstod ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mchod dang bstod ces bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: sngar shes nas zhes bya ba ni sngar shes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar shes nas zhes bya ba ni sngar shes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: dga' bral dang por zhes bya ba ni dga' bral gyi dang por ro //
analyzed: dga' bral dang por zhes bya ba ni dga' bral gyi dang por ro //
translated: The first separation from joy is the first separation from joy.

original: mchog mtha' zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i mtha' ste dbang bskur ba gsum pa zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩgal te rgyud thams cad nas lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa nyid can gyi de kho na nyid yin na /
analyzed: mchog mtha' zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i mtha' ste dbang bskur ba gsum pa zhes bya ba'i don to // gal te rgyud thams cad nas lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa nyid can gyi de kho na nyid yin na /
translated: The end of supreme joy is the end of supreme joy, which means the third consecration.

original: 'dir khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: 'dir khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /

original: sbas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sbas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba ni /

analyzed: thams cad rgyud du zhes bya ba rgyud thams cad du sbas pa yin no //

original: de ltar na sngar ci zhig bstan zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na sngar ci zhig bstan zhe na /

original: mtha' mthas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mtha' mthas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The end by the end,

original: slob dpon dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba rab tu bstan pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o ;
analyzed: slob dpon dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba rab tu bstan pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o ;
translated: it is intended that the master and secret initiations are well taught.

original: / gang gi phyir shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba 'di sngar gong du bstan pas des na de'i phyir zhus pa /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba 'di sngar gong du bstan pas des na de'i phyir zhus pa /

analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba la'o //
translated: In that,

analyzed: dbang bskur ba gzhan chu dang cod pan la sogs pa thams cad 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dbang bskur ba bzhi char yang /
translated: all the other initiations, such as the water and crown initiations, are similar in nature, and therefore all four initiations

original: rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: are to be performed with the method of vajra worship.

original: zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinction.

original: de'i phyir de la zhus pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la zhus pa ni /

analyzed: de yi skad cig ji ltar lags // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: skad cig ces bya ba'i sgras 'dir skad cig gi rang gi ngo bo dang / thob par rjod par byed de 'di dag ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba'i sgras 'dir skad cig gi rang gi ngo bo dang / thob par rjod par byed de 'di dag ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig yin no //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúmoment‚Äù expresses the intrinsic nature of a moment, and these are words that summarize.

original: @57a * // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: @57a * // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: thog ma dbus mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thog ma dbus mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: thog ma ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //

original: mtha' ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //

original: dbus zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang po'o //
analyzed: dbus zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang po'o //

original: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min //
analyzed: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min //
translated: Neither existence nor nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsum po de dag ji ltar rigs par srid pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum po de dag ji ltar rigs par srid pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because those three have the nature of existence and nirvƒÅ·πáa, respectively.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: This is said to have the characteristics that will be explained.

original: mchog tu bde zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: mchog tu bde zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Supreme bliss has the characteristic of co-emergence.

original: bdag med gzhan yang med ces bya ba ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: bdag med gzhan yang med ces bya ba ni gzung 'dzin dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: The line there is no self and no other means freedom from subject and object.

original: yang na thog ma dbus mtha' med //
analyzed: yang na thog ma dbus mtha' med //
translated: Or else, it is without beginning, middle, or end.

original: ces bya ba la dang po bya ba yin pas thog ma ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la dang po bya ba yin pas thog ma ste /
translated: The beginning is the first action,

original: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: which is the master initiation.

original: mtha' zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba bzhi ba'o //
analyzed: mtha' zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba bzhi ba'o //
translated: The end is the fourth initiation.

original: dbus ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: dbus ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: The middle is the secret initiation.

original: 'di ni de dag ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: 'di ni de dag ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: This is not like those, is the meaning.

original: ci ltar ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar ma yin zhe na /

original: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is neither existence nor transcendence.üîΩThe path is called the path because the qualities of a buddha are possible from it.

original: 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams srid par gyur bas na lam zhes bya ba slob dpon dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams srid par gyur bas na lam zhes bya ba slob dpon dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The master initiation and the secret initiation are the path.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni bzhi pa ste /
translated: Transcendence is the fourth initiation,

original: de thob na bya ba byas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thob na bya ba byas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when it is attained, one has the nature of having done what was to be done.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: This is the wisdom initiation.

original: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What kind?

original: bdag med gzhan yang med ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag med gzhan yang med ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúno self, no other,‚Äù

original: gad la shes rab thabs rjes su mi dmigs pa'i phyir gnyis su med par rab tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gad la shes rab thabs rjes su mi dmigs pa'i phyir gnyis su med par rab tu gsal ba'o //
translated: where there is no duality because of the non-apprehension of wisdom and means.

original: de ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does that occur?

original: rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi //
analyzed: rang gi g-yas dang lag gzhan gyi //
translated: ‚ÄúWith one‚Äôs right and other hand,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩg-yas pa ni g-yas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / g-yas pa ni g-yas pa'o //
translated: and so on is said.üîΩThe right is the right.

original: g-yon pa ni g-yon pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa ni g-yon pa'o //
translated: The left is the left.

original: las zhes bya ba ni srog go //üîΩmthe bong ni la la n'a'o //
analyzed: las zhes bya ba ni srog go // mthe bong ni la la n'a'o //
translated: The action is the life-force.üîΩThe thumb is the lalana.

original: srin lag nir sa n'a'o //
analyzed: srin lag nir sa n'a'o //
translated: The ring finger is the rasana.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni de dag go //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni de dag go //
translated: The ‚Äúwhat‚Äù is those.

original: longs spyod ni yang dag par nyams su myong ba'i don to //
analyzed: longs spyod ni yang dag par nyams su myong ba'i don to //
translated: Enjoyment is the meaning of perfect experience.

original: rlabs gnyis zhes bya ba ni g-yas g-yon gyi rlung 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rlabs gnyis zhes bya ba ni g-yas g-yon gyi rlung 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'o //
translated: The two waves are the exhalation and inhalation of the right and left winds.

original: des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What does that do?

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, and so on is said.

original: shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is there the empowerment of wisdom and knowledge,

original: phyi nas phyi rol gyi shes rab med par yang skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nas phyi rol gyi shes rab med par yang skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: And later, without external wisdom, it arises.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni gnyis @57b su med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni gnyis @57b su med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: Wisdom is the wisdom of the nature of non-duality.

original: gzhon nu ma yis sbyor myong bzhin //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yis sbyor myong bzhin // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Like a virgin's experience of union.

original: sbyor myong bzhin zhes bya ba ni sngar dbang bskur ba bzhin bdag gis thob par ma gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor myong bzhin zhes bya ba ni sngar dbang bskur ba bzhin bdag gis thob par ma gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase like a virgin's experience of union means that it is not something that one has previously obtained through initiation.

original: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bzhin //
analyzed: lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bzhin //
translated: Like a mute's dream.

original: zhes bya ba ni ngag gi spyod yul las 'das pa'o //

analyzed: 'phyang thag 'dra bar rab tu grags /

original: bud med du pus mo bslangs nas ni /

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i don byed pa'i khyad par gang du ston pa'i le'u la yang de skad bya'o //

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'i 'grel ba'o /

original: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni dbang bzhi'i tshigs bcad kyi man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab gtad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje rab gnas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang nyid du rnam par gnas pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub ni shes rab bo //

analyzed: de'i sras ni byang chub sems dpa'o //

original: dga' ba ni brtse ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni brtse ba'o //

original: gnas ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: gnas ni byang chub kyi sems so //

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: ches phra zhing zhes bya ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //

original: dkyil ni snying po'o //
analyzed: dkyil ni snying po'o //

original: rdul bral zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs bzad pa'o //
analyzed: rdul bral zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs bzad pa'o //

analyzed: mthar phyin zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba las 'das pa nyid do //

original: zhi ba nyid ces bya ba ni gnod pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //üîΩkhyod rang @61a * //

original: nyid ni khyod kyi pha //
analyzed: nyid ni khyod kyi pha //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyod nyid so so rang gis rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: rdo rje padma byin gyis brlabs pa ni rang gis byin gyis rlob pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje padma byin gyis brlabs pa ni rang gis byin gyis rlob pa'o //

original: rin chen rnal 'byor rnams kyi phreng //
analyzed: rin chen rnal 'byor rnams kyi phreng //

original: dgyes ba'i rdo rje'i 'grel byas pas //
analyzed: dgyes ba'i rdo rje'i 'grel byas pas //

original: bsod nam bsags pa gang yod des //
analyzed: bsod nam bsags pa gang yod des //

original: 'gro kun nyon mongs kun bral shog / dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
